# Credentials format

## Algorithmia

File: 'algorithmia.json'

'''
	{
		"apiKey": "simYW4NKk0LTfWajP1UOsYnSSJq1"
	}
'''

## Watson Natural Language Understanding

File: 'watson-nlu.json'

'''
	{
  		"apikey": "Utf3XYi7CI7E9F305POew-A0fZx00QPtgGToXWYFKIx-",
  		"iam_apikey_description": "Auto generated apikey during resource-key operation for Instance - crn:v1:bluemix:public:natural-language-understanding:us-south:a/8bcba790629e48db942dc00b0300d088:7de84187-3940-454c-b95a-ecfb8f8b4f94::",
